MainPage.title: Find your face on Twitter
MainPage.subtitle1: Click the camera button and show your face to the camera
MainPage.subtitle2: The more you show your face to the front, the more accurate it is

ResultPage.title: As a result of face recognition, these photos are suspected
ResultPage.subtitle1: Please check the original tweet and select only your photos.
ResultPage.subtitle2: If the original tweet is deleted or is a suspended account, please click Delete button
ResultPage.suspendAccountReport: Suspended account report has been completed

NetworkmapPage.title: Twitter networkmap
NetworkmapPage.subtitle1: It is the account where clicked like or retweet on the original tweet
NetworkmapPage.subtitle2: If you click on the nodes, you can move on to original tweet and check the report result

ReportPage.title: Please enter your email and click the report button
ReportPage.subtitle2: Please report only the definite images
ReportPage.validEmailCheck: Please enter your e-mail in a proper format
ReportPage.helperText: It will be sent within 24 hours
ReportPage.button: Report on Twitter and receive evidence
